__e: What I mean to say is life is hard enough as it is, and it seems to me that you wouldn't want to make it any more difficult for your child.
Do you think your brother and your father would want you here, doing this?
Now I've gotten so good at it, all the... that all I can think to say is what I know they'd want to hear.
I said, "My husband said yous guys was comin'..."
But they're still not gonna help us.
They ask where you're from. Lots must have happened to you.
You'd go there, but they'd be someplace else and so would the money.
I didn't think they'd get to the second floor until after you left for school.
Then I would go to school... and you and Mom would go to work.
What do you think they'll do to a guy like me ?
No... The second it happened, I knew it. But I didn't know they were gonna do it, I had no idea.
Actually, what we were talkin' about was maybe hitting' up this costume party later tonight, and I didn't know what you were up to tonight...
It's too bad their folks ain't here to see it, 'cause I know they'd feel better about it.
What's really strange is that one would have a child who grew up to be a serial killer, the other would have a child that grew up to be an FBI profiler and that the two of you would meet someday.
I think you and this guy would really hit it off.
All that week, all I could think of was how they were actually going to cut me open and take out a part of me that was with me my entire life.
